repairedDockerfile:
FROM centos:7 
MAINTAINER Jonas Bystr√∂m <jonas@lediga.st> 

ENV PEN_VERSION="0.34.1" 
WORKDIR /tmp 
RUN yum upgrade -y 
RUN yum install -y gcc wget make && rm -rf /var/cache/yum
RUN wget https://siag.nu/pub/pen/pen-${PEN_VERSION}.tar.gz
RUN tar zxvf pen-${PEN_VERSION}.tar.gz && rm pen-${PEN_VERSION}.tar.gz
WORKDIR /tmp/pen-${PEN_VERSION} 
RUN ./configure --build="$(dpkg-architecture --query DEB_BUILD_GNU_TYPE)"
RUN make 
RUN make install 
WORKDIR /root 
RUN rm -rf /tmp/pen-${PEN_VERSION} 
COPY assets/pen.sh /bin/pen.sh 
ENTRYPOINT /bin/bash /bin/pen.sh
